jchain.net

Class Miner

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchain.net.Miner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subscriber<Transaction>

    public class Miner
extends java.lang.Object
implements Subscriber<Transaction>
    Represents a miner in the jchain system. A Miner runs on its own thread of execution.
    Since:
    4/15/2019

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Miner(BC chain)
      Returns a new instance of a Miner with the default pool size.
      Miner(BC chain, int poolSize)
      Returns a new instance of a Miner with the specified pool size.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void receive(Transaction tx)
      Receives broadcasted transactions and adds them to the pool.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Miner

        public Miner(BC chain)
        Returns a new instance of a Miner with the default pool size.
        Parameters:
        chain - The miners initial blockchain.

      • Miner

        public Miner(BC chain,
             int poolSize)
        Returns a new instance of a Miner with the specified pool size. If the pool size is invalid, then the miner will have a pool of size TxnMemoryPool.MAX_POOL_SIZE / 2
        Parameters:
        chain - The Miners initial blockchain.
        poolSize - A transaction pool size.

    • Method Detail

      • receive

        public void receive(Transaction tx)
        Receives broadcasted transactions and adds them to the pool.
        Specified by:
        receive in interface Subscriber<Transaction>
        Parameters:
        tx - A transaction to add to the pool.
